price: 119. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyow! Alle ka cabsada (oo dhowra xilkuu idin saaray), ahaadana la jirka kuwa runlowyada ah.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَكُونُواْ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha wakūnū maʿa al-ṣādiqīna
